soluna-dial.settings.masterHudToggle.hin: Globally enable or disable the Soluna Dial.
soluna-dial.settings.globalFontFamily.hi: Set the font family for all text elements in the Soluna Dial.
soluna-dial.settings.hudTopPadding.name: HUD Top Padding
soluna-dial.settings.hudTopPadding.hint: Set the top padding for the HUD (e.g., '20px', '5%'). Useful for aligning with other UI elements.
soluna-dial.settings.globalUiSize.name: Global UI Size
soluna-dial.settings.globalUiSize.hint: Adjust the overall size of the Soluna Dial. 1.0 is default.
soluna-dial.settings.globalFontOpacity.h: Adjust the opacity of all text elements. 1.0 is fully opaque.
soluna-dial.settings.toggleSecondsDispla: Show or hide seconds in the time display.
soluna-dial.settings.topBarOpacity.name: Top Bar Background Opacity
soluna-dial.settings.topBarOpacity.hint: Adjust the opacity of the top bar background (time and calendar area).
soluna-dial.settings.toggleCalendarDispl: Show or hide the calendar display in the top bar.
soluna-dial.settings.dialImageOpacity.hi: Adjust the opacity of the sun/moon dial image.
soluna-dial.settings.toggleDialMarker.hi: Show or hide the marker indicating the current time on the dial.
soluna-dial.settings.dialMarkerColor.hin: Set the color of the dial's current time marker.
soluna-dial.settings.dialMarkerOpacity.h: Adjust the opacity of the dial's current time marker.
soluna-dial.settings.toggleWeatherDispla: Show or hide the weather display text.
